thread.title: Ford's April China vehicle sales slump 26 pct y/y

title: Ford's April China vehicle sales slump 26 pct y/y
text:
May 11, 2018 / 6:25 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago Ford's April China vehicle sales slump 26 pct y/y Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
BEIJING, May 11 (Reuters) - Ford Motor Coâ€™s vehicle sales in China dropped 26 percent in April from a year earlier to 69,503 vehicles, the company said on Friday.
Sales volume during the first four months of the year totaled 276,642 vehicles, down 21 percent from the same period a year ago. (Reporting By Norihiko Shirouzu Editing by Shri Navaratnam)
